LanguageData.Force_AlignmentGain: Gain Darkside/Lightside Attunement based on certain actions
LanguageData.Force_PsycastStat: Should Psychic Sensitivity be calculated for Force Push and Repulse?
LanguageData.Force_Entropy_Gain: Entropy Gain on Deflection ( Projectile Speed / Entropy Gain Value)
LanguageData.Force_DropChance: Kyber crystal drop chance when cutting stone blocks
LanguageData.Force.LightsaberGlowDesc: Should a glow be drawn for drafted pawns?
LanguageData.Force.LightsaberRealGlowDesc: Real Glow - Uses the in game lighting system. Can impact performance, looks better.
LanguageData.Force.LightsaberFakeGlowDesc: Fake Glow - Uses a texture to simulate a fake glow, Low performance impact, not as high quality
LanguageData.Force.DeflectionSpinDesc: Whether or not the Lightsaber spins when deflecting projectiles.
LanguageData.Force.CustomStanceDesc: Enables the custom stance system within the stance gizmo. Allows manually adjusting angles and offsets WARNING! NOT FULLY TESTED MAY CAUSE INDEX OUT OF BOUNDS ERROR WHEN CLICKING GIZMO, TO FIX CLICK RESET
